name: Red Green and Blue
description:
A VERY small platformer made in Godot Engine where you die if you touch something that is not your color. I initially wanted to do something larger but life got in the way, such is the way of things.

For the graphics i used Kenney's 1-Bit Platformer Pack and for the sounds i used https://sfxr.me/

Made for mini jam 73: Power that had the following restriction:

Limitation: Only 5 colors
